meanings.sent1: The parsleyed potatoes added a pop of color to the plate.
meanings.sent2: The chef parsleyed the dish before serving it to the guests.
meanings.sent3: The parsleyed salad looked like a mini garden on the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her parsleyed hair was a unique fashion statement at the party.
meanings.sent5: The parsleyed chicken smelled fresh and flavorful.

meanings.definition: Having parsley added as a seasoning or flavoring.
meanings.sent1: The parsleyed soup had a refreshing taste.
meanings.sent2: She always makes the best parsleyed pasta dishes.
meanings.sent3: The parsleyed ice cream was an unexpected but delicious treat.
meanings.sent4: His parsleyed drink was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent5: The parsleyed bread had a unique and savory flavor.
